text: Detre may refer to: *László Detre (microbiologist) (1874-1939), Hungarian physician who suggested the concept of antigens *László Detre (astronomer) (1906-1974), Hungarian astronomer *Thomas Detre (1924-2010), Hungarian- American psychiatrist and "visionary" academic leader *1538 Detre, an asteroid named after the astronomer *Detre Bebek (14th-15th century), a palatine in the Kingdom of Hungary (:hu:Bebek Detre)
title: Detre
